00044 #ifndef __HOST_H__
00045 #define __HOST_H__
00046 
00047 #include <limits.h>
00048 
00049 #ifdef __cplusplus
00050 extern "C"
00051 {
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00055 /*                                                                           */
00056 /* Type Definition Macros                                                    */
00057 /*                                                                           */
00058 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 #ifndef __WORDSIZE
00060   /* Assume 32 */
00061   #define __WORDSIZE 32
00062 #endif
00063 
00064 #ifdef _LINUX
00065     typedef unsigned char  uint8;
00066     typedef char           int8;
00067     typedef unsigned short uint16;
00068     typedef short          int16;
00069     typedef unsigned int   uint32;
00070     typedef int            int32;
00071     typedef int            SOCKET;
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 #ifdef WIN32
00075     typedef unsigned char  uint8;
00076     typedef char           int8;
00077     typedef unsigned short uint16;
00078     typedef short          int16;
00079     typedef unsigned int   uint32;
00080     typedef int            int32;
00081 #endif
00082 
00083 #ifdef WIN32
00084     typedef int socklen_t;
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 #if defined(WIN32)
00088     typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
00089     typedef long long int          int64;
00090 #elif (__WORDSIZE == 32)
00091     __extension__
00092     typedef long long int          int64;
00093     __extension__
00094     typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
00095 #elif (__WORDSIZE == 64)
00096     typedef unsigned long int uint64;
00097     typedef long int          int64;
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 #ifdef WIN32
00101   #define UINT8_MAX  (UCHAR_MAX)
00102   #define UINT16_MAX (USHRT_MAX)
00103   #define UINT32_MAX (ULONG_MAX)
00104 
00105   #if __WORDSIZE == 64
00106     #define SIZE_MAX (18446744073709551615UL)
00107   #else
00108     #ifndef SIZE_MAX
00109     #define SIZE_MAX (4294967295U)
00110   #endif
00111 #endif
00112   #endif
00113 
00114 #ifndef WIN32
00115     typedef unsigned char BOOL;
00116     #define bool BOOL
00117   #endif
00118 
00119 #if defined(WIN32)
00120   #define ssize_t size_t
00121 #endif
00122

00126 /* Socket Macros                                                             */
00127 /*                                                                           */
00128 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00129 #ifdef WIN32
00130 #define SHUT_RD                0
00131 #define SHUT_WR                1
00132 #define SHUT_RDWR              2
00133 #define ACCEPT(a,b,c)          accept(a,b,c)
00134 #define CONNECT(a,b,c)         connect(a,b,c)
00135 #define CLOSE(a)               closesocket(a)
00136 #define READ(a,b,c)            read(a,b,c)
00137 #define RECV(a,b,c,d)          recv(a, (char *)b, c, d)
00138 #define RECVFROM(a,b,c,d,e,f)  recvfrom(a, (char *)b, c, d, (sockaddr *)e, (int *)f)
00139 #define RECV_FLAGS             MSG_WAITALL
00140 #define SELECT(a,b,c,d,e)      select((int32)a,b,c,d,e)
00141 #define SEND(a,b,c,d)          send(a, (const char *)b, (int)c, d)
00142 #define SENDTO(a,b,c,d,e,f)    sendto(a, (const char *)b, (int)c, d, e, f)
00143 #define SEND_FLAGS             0
00144 #define SENDFILE(a,b,c,d)      sendfile(a, b, c, d)
00145 #define SET_SOCKET_ERROR(x,y)  errno=y
00146 #define SOCKET_ERROR_INTERUPT  EINTR
00147 #define SOCKET_ERROR_TIMEDOUT  EAGAIN
00148 #define WRITE(a,b,c)           write(a,b,c)
00149 #define WRITEV(a,b,c)          writev(a, b, c)
00150 #define GETSOCKOPT(a,b,c,d,e)  getsockopt(a,b,c,(char *)d, (int *)e)
00151 #define SETSOCKOPT(a,b,c,d,e)  setsockopt(a,b,c,(char *)d, (int)e)
00152 #define GETHOSTBYNAME(a)       gethostbyname((const char *)a)
00153 #endif
00154 
00155 #ifdef _LINUX
00156 #define ACCEPT(a,b,c)          accept(a,b,c)
00157 #define CONNECT(a,b,c)         connect(a,b,c)
00158 #define CLOSE(a)               close(a)
00159 #define READ(a,b,c)            read(a,b,c)
00160 #define RECV(a,b,c,d)          recv(a, (void *)b, c, d)
00161 #define RECVFROM(a,b,c,d,e,f)  recvfrom(a, (char *)b, c, d, (sockaddr *)e, f)
00162 #define RECV_FLAGS             MSG_WAITALL
00163 #define SELECT(a,b,c,d,e)      select(a,b,c,d,e)
00164 #define SEND(a,b,c,d)          send(a, (const int8 *)b, c, d)
00165 #define SENDTO(a,b,c,d,e,f)    sendto(a, (const int8 *)b, c, d, e, f)
00166 #define SEND_FLAGS             0
00167 #define SENDFILE(a,b,c,d)      sendfile(a, b, c, d)
00168 #define SET_SOCKET_ERROR(x,y)  errno=y
00169 #define SOCKET_ERROR_INTERUPT  EINTR
00170 #define SOCKET_ERROR_TIMEDOUT  EAGAIN
00171 #define WRITE(a,b,c)           write(a,b,c)
00172 #define WRITEV(a,b,c)          writev(a, b, c)
00173 #define GETSOCKOPT(a,b,c,d,e)  getsockopt(a,b,c,d,(socklen_t *)e)
00174 #define SETSOCKOPT(a,b,c,d,e)  setsockopt(a,b,c,d,e)
00175 #define GETHOSTBYNAME(a)       gethostbyname((const char *)a)
00176 #endif

00195 #define FSTAT(s, st)        fstat(FILENO(s), st)
00196 #define FWRITE(a,b,c,d)     fwrite(a, b, c, d)

00205 #if defined(WIN32)
00206   #define GET_CLOCK_COUNT(x) QueryPerformanceCounter((LARGE_INTEGER *)x)
00207 #else
00208   #define GET_CLOCK_COUNT(x) gettimeofday(x, NULL)
00209 #endif
00210 
00211 #if defined(WIN32)
00212   #define STRTOULL(x) _atoi64(x)
00213 #else
00214   #define STRTOULL(x) strtoull(x, NULL, 10)
00215 #endif
00216 
00217 #if defined(WIN32)
00218   #define SNPRINTF _snprintf
00219   #define PRINTF   printf
00220   #define VPRINTF  vprintf
00221   #define FPRINTF  fprintf
00222 #else 
00223   #define SNPRINTF snprintf
00224   #define PRINTF   printf
00225   #define VPRINTF  vprintf
00226   #define FPRINTF  fprintf
